landing.title: Welcome to the SMA App!
landing.subtitle: This application allows you to communicate with an intelligent agent easily and effectively.

form.title: Access the system
form.subtitle: Fill in the fields to continue

connection.positionQrCode: Place the QR Code in the center of the camera

snackbar.qrMissingFields: Invalid QR code: missing required fields
snackbar.qrInvalidJson: Invalid QR code: incorrect JSON format
snackbar.ipRequired: Please enter the ContextNet network IP
snackbar.portRequired: Please enter the ContextNet network port

chat.title: Chat

help.title: How to use Chat
help.intro: You only need to type your message content!
help.description: The application automatically formats your message in the ContextNet protocol. You don't need to worry about the complete structure.
help.askOneDesc: Asks a question to a specific agent
help.askAllDesc: Asks a question to all agents
help.achieveDesc: Requests the agent to perform an action
help.tellHowDesc: Teaches the agent how to do something
help.tipText: Select the message type in the dropdown and type only the content. The application takes care of the rest!

chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
chat.notConnected: Not connected. Return to the home page to connect.
